titles.title: I Can Clearly See Your Holiness

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I can clearly see Your holiness
As I look around this place.
With my arms stretched out to receive your love.
I can see you on each face.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Spirit of God, lift me up.
Spirit of God, lift me up.
Fill me again with Your love, sweet Spirit of God.
Spirit of God, lift me up.
Spirit of God, lift me up.
Fill me again with your love, sweet Spirit of God.
